activity1.name: YMCA Summer Camp
activity1.description: YMCA Sports Camps provide campers with the opportunity to learn sport-specific skills, which will help them enjoy each sport through fun and exciting drills and games. All skill levels are welcomed and encouraged. Choose from basketball, flag football or soccer camp. This half-day camp can be paired with YMCA Day Camp for a full day of fun! YMCA Sports Camps are offered at the Brentwood, Donelson-Hermitage, North Rutherford (Smyrna), Northwest and Robertson County (Springfield) Ys.

activity2.name: Bare Foot Republic Camp
activity2.description: Barefoot Republic is a multi-cultural camp that celebrates diversity and builds unity by facilitating the development of Christ-centered relationships between individuals from diverse cultural, racial and socioeconomic backgrounds. The camp sets upon 110 acres on Barren Lake just north of Nashville and hosts 6 sessions of overnight camp for rising 3rd-12th graders and 2 weeks of day camp for rising 1st-5th graders in Nashville and Franklin, TN. Each session is filled with action-packed and team-building activities, small group time and inspiring evening programs designed to build lifelong friendships. Instruction is given in specialty areas including traditional athletics, extreme sports, performing arts and fine arts.

activity3.name: Travellers Rest Plantation and Museum
activity3.description: School, home-school and scout programs are available year round, focusing on teaching kids about historic Nashville life. Special events throughout the year include The World of the Plantation in April and a Spring Sampler in May.Travel through history and experience a summer of adventure at Travellers Rest Summer Camp, winner of Nickelodeon’s Parents Pick Best Day Cam in Nashville. Junior Docent camp, Histories Mysteries camp, hands-on history camp, folk arts camp, adventures in history camp (includes civil war and frontier adventures.

activity4.name: Gordon JCC Camp Davis
activity4.description: Located on gorgeous 52-acre facility, Camp Davis has been  creating summer memories for nearly 90 years. Camp is not just summertime childcare it is a family. At Camp Davis we provide our family members with foundation for growth, which they will use to change the world.

activity5.name: Camp Widjiwagan
activity5.description: Every day at YMCA Camp Widjiwagan’s Day Camp (Ages 4-16) is packed with challenge, fun, and excitement. General activities available at Camp Widjiwagan include canoeing, archery, swimming, ropes activities, drama, nature activities, arts and crafts, sports, and many more! Our Traditional Day Camp is divided into six “Nations” by age. Each activity is led by a counselor and provides opportunities for your camper to meet and participate with a wide variety of new friends! Check into the Intro to Music Add-On, Widji Color Olympics week, and Fully-Themed Camps including Pirate, Princess, Lego, and Nerf. The Equestrian Day Camp department added Pony Camp and many new Farm Camp animals.

activity6.name: CreeKSide Ridgin Academy & Stables
activity6.description: We offer horseback riding near Nashville, horseback riding lessons, trail rides near Nashville, trail riding in Franklin, Horse & Pony Birthday Parties, Group Horseback Trail Rides, riding lessons, Pony Parties, Trail rides, horse trail riding and more. We have information on horse boarding, riding arenas, round pens, horse purchases, horses for sale, etc.
